title: What are the best K-pop and urban R&B songs (not R&B ballads)? - Quora

response.answer_text: K-Pop R&B: You need to look at the earlier songs from groups like Big Bang or SHINee, before they switch to the more Electro sound. Brown Eyed Girls is also still doing R&B, even post-Abracadabra, just not as a single.  Urban R&B: love, LOVE Tinashe. Check out 2 On & All Hands on Deck, but DEFINITELY check out her album Aquarius, and all of her previous free mixtape. Pure gem. LIZ also has a good throwback sound
I'm sorry I'm not familiar with urban R&B songs.As for the best K-pop songs,I think different people have different standard.
